name: conjoint
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving two or more people or things working together: The conjoint use of several different treatments can sometimes produce excellent results. In some instances, the national government has conjoint authority with local authorities. Related word
conjoin
More examplesFewer examplesThe story relates the separate and conjoint activities of two main characters.The department was operating under the conjoint management of local and national government.The final document was the product of the conjoint work of seven people.
